links.label: Axiomatic CSS and Lobotomized Owls
links.snippet: HEYDON PICKERING introduces a new three-character CSS selector called the "lobotomized owl selector". He demonstrates how the selector can reduce bloat, speed up development, and help automate the styling of arbitrary, dynamic content.

links.label: Why I don't use the javascript "new" keyword
links.snippet: TL;DR: In Javascript, use Object.create instead of using the "new" keyword.
